message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at a competitive price of $120. I believe it offers excellent value, even above its price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to pay that price, but I'm not sure if it's worth it at $120.
I understand your position, Bob. How about we meet halfway at $105? That's a fair deal for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. I'm trying to be fair, but I really need to stay within my budget.
